name: Dr. Amanda Richards
bio: Dr. Richards founded EduConsult with a vision to make international education accessible to students worldwide. She has helped over 5000 students achieve their dreams.

name: James Patterson
bio: James brings extensive experience in university admissions and has secured millions in scholarships for students across various programs.

name: Dr. Priya Patel
bio: Dr. Patel specializes in STEM program guidance and has helped numerous students secure positions in top engineering and technology programs.

name: Sarah Williams
education: LLM in Immigration Law, Georgetown University
bio: Sarah ensures smooth visa processes with a 98% success rate, guiding students through complex immigration requirements.
